name: Feature Request

title: '[Feature] '

---

## Which Skill or Command?

Which existing skill or command would this improve?

## What's Missing?

Describe the gap in the current functionality.

## Proposed Solution

How would you like it to work? Be as specific as possible.

## Shopify Context

If relevant, explain how this relates to Shopify app marketing specifically.

## Alternatives Considered

Any other approaches you've thought about.
